text:
There will be no power supply from 9.45 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Wednesday in the following areas of the city owing to maintenance work to be taken up by the Tangedco at the Tiruchi 110 KV sub-station:

Central Bus Stand and Railway Junction areas, Williams Road, Royal Road, Promenade Road, Collector Office Road, Warners Road, Lawsons Road, Reynolds Road, Cantonment, Melapudur, Pudukottai Road Overbridge, Convent Road, Head Post Office, Goodshed Road, Mudaliar Chathram, parts of Khajapettai and Woraiyur, Mettutheru, Walajah Bazaar, Vannarapettai, Vayalur Road - Kumaran Nagar to Rettai Vaical, Ramalinga Nagar, Fathima Nagar, Kuzhumani Road – Nachiyar Kovil to Seerathoppu, Ponnagar, Crawford, Arasu Colony, Rajiv Gandhi Nagar, Dheeran Nagar, Pirattiyur, Somarasampettai, Allithurai, Pallakadu, Vayalur, Vyazhanmedu, Puliyur and Ettarai.
title: Power shutdown
